entries.meaning: The act or process of transferring someone or something to another, of sending by reference, or referring.
examples: The insurance company insists I get a referral from my regular doctor. I can't just go to the specialist; a GP has got to refer me.

entries.meaning: (slang) A document used by schools detailing some form of a student's misbehavior and listing the actions taken before and after the student's receipt of the referral.
examples: After misbehaving in class, George was given a referral for disrupting class and sent to the office.
